attributes.action: enforce service provision by London Midland or remove their contract from Birmingham lines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: London Midland have repetitively failed to provide enough rolling stock for trains on the Birmingham, Dorridge line and possibly more.  This negligence has created an unsafe environment for commuters who are crushed on a train, pushed between the train and the platform.  Many problems are also caused by having to wait for the next service.  Something must be done to resolve this.
